nodes.text: The Private Journals of Mace Windu
The Private Journals of Mace Windu were a series of journals released by Imperial propaganda architects in the aftermath of Order 66.

The purpose of the Journals was to convince the general public that the Jedi had been plotting to conquer the Republic. To make their fabrications more believable, the propagandists included actual recordings of Mace Windu. The Journals included a section about Master Windu's visit to Haruun Kal and his interaction with the Korunnai. The Imperial propaganda machine used the falsified document to provoke anti-Jedi sentiment in the citizens of the Empire.
